summary: Adds the true nord girl Jessica to Skyrim!
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://copy.com/RZulDFp8Ztuv[/img]



This is my first time doing a lore friendly mod. (Except for the name)

This mod is Standalone. meaning you do not need to have any other mods installed for this to work.

Jessica is one of my characters, and since i wanted to make a new character, but still not lose Jessica. I decided to turn her into a follower.

- Some screenshots would be highly appreciated.


[color=#339933][size=6][b]Jessica[/b][/size][/color]

Jessica is a true nord, trained in dual wielding.

She was born and raised in Riverwood. But at the age of 14 her parents were killed by bandits, due to the lack of defence in Riverwood.
Her grandparents then watched over her. But ever since the day her parents died, she been urging revenge. So at the age of 20 she snook out at night, to find her parents killers. To this day she is hold up in Whiterun, and still looking for the bandits that murdered her parents.

-Perhaps you could help her.

[b]Body:[/b] Sevenbase Original - Weight: 100
[b]Location:[/b] Whiterun - Bannered Mare
[b]Default Outfit: [/b]Ancient Nord Armor (Skimpy)
[b]Inventory:[/b] 2x War axes.
[b]Combat Style:[/b] Dual wielding
[b]Spells: [/b]Flames, Healing


[color=#ff9933][size=5][b]Recommended Mods[/b][/size][/color]


[i][color=#ffcc33][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Face Light [/url][/size][/color][/i]

[i][color=#ffcc33][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27593/?]Equipable Wet Female Body[/url][/color][/i]

[i][color=#ffcc33][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?]Sevenbase[/url][/color][/i]



[color=#cc6633][size=5][b]Credits[/b][/size][/color]


[b][color=#cc6633][size=2][i]Apachii for hair[/i][/size][/color][/b]


[b][size=2][i]Crosscrusade for Body[/i][/size][/b]


[b][size=2][i]LogRaam for Eyes[/i][/size][/b]


[b][size=2][i]Zonzai for Body textures[/i][/size][/b]


[center]Enjoy![/center]
author: Titan
